column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=El Pital
#Text=El Pital is in Western El Salvador .
#Text=Landscape
#Text=El Pital mount offers scenic views on the surrounding moutains ( including in Guatemala and Honduras ) , and allows to see all the major volcanoes of El Salvador .
#Text=Flora and fauna
#Text=The flora is of course very different of what can be found in the lower areas of El Salvador .
#Text=It seems much less tropical here , except for some could forests on the way to the top to El Pital .
#Text=Even at the dry season , grass stays green in El Pital .
#Text=Climate
#Text=Due to its elevation ( ~2700 m ) , El Pital is really fresh , in comparasion to most locations in El Salvador .
#Text=It nevers snows there , but rain can be chilly cold .
#Text=Avoid the rainy season .
#Text=Get in
#Text=The road is steep to El Pital , but good enough to get to Rio Chiquito village with a basic car .
#Text=If you want to drive to the top of the mountain , you 'll need a good 4x4 car .
#Text=Some camionetas drive tourists to El Pital . ~25USD/vehicle .
#Text=Fees and permits
#Text=The top of the mountain is located on a private land .
#Text=Admission costs US$3/person , plus and extra for cars .
#Text=The very top of the moutain is actually located in Honduras .
#Text=Some Salvadorian soldiers block the way ( theorically ) , a few hundred meters from it .
#Text=Get around
#Text=Rio Chiquito
#Text=Village is small , everything can be done by foot .
#Text=The center of the village has good roads , but they quickly become tracks as soon as you get out of the center .
#Text=See
#Text=According to the locals , quetzals can be seen at the very top of the moutain .
#Text=Do
#Text=Hike from Rio Chiquito to the top ( less than 2 hours one way ) .
#Text=Buy
#Text=A few tiendas can be found in Rio Chiquito .
#Text=Prices are high .
#Text=Eat
#Text=Rio Chiquito offers a few comedors and some restaurants .
#Text=Some restaurants can also be found at the top of the mountain , but they are not open every day .
#Text=Sleep
#Text=El Pital
#Text=mount and Rio Chiquito Village offer plenty of accommodation options ( most of which are overpriced ) , including hotels , cabañas , and campgrounds .
#Text=Lodging
#Text=Lecho de Flores ( Hotel El Pital ) , Rio Chiquito ( turn right when arriving in Rio Chiquito , it is located ) , ☏ +50323590782 .
#Text=Offers nice cabañas in a lovely garden .

#Text=They try to sell 50/70USD full packages ( including accommodation , dinner , breakfast , and transportation/entrance to El Pital ) , but simple accommodation can be bargained for cheaper price .
#Text=US$ 30 .
#Text=Hostal Miramundo , ☏ +50322196252 , ✉ hostal.miramundo@gmail.com .
#Text=Hostel & restaurant
#Text=La Posada del Cielo , ☏ +50322892843 , ✉ info@hotellaposadadelcielo.com .
#Text=US$ 56 .
#Text=Camping
#Text=Camping and cabañas ( In Rio Chuiquito village , on the right , just before the road to El Pital becomes steep . ) .
#Text=Camping on the ground of a lovely couple of farmers .
#Text=US$2/person .
#Text=A 4-person tent can be rented for US$ 15 .
#Text=They also have 3 cabañas ( US$ 25 - 40 ) .
#Text=US$ 4 .
#Text=Lecho de Flores , Almost at the top of El Pital , ☏ +50379495871 , ✉ contacto@elpitallechodeflores.com .
#Text=US$5/person - tent rental : US$15/4 persons - they also have a cabaña , for US$ 50 - 60 ( overpriced , but this is the only one at this elevation ) .
#Text=10$ .
#Text=Stay safe
#Text=One of the really safe places in El Salvador .
